text: Pen tap anɨb ak gos nɨgol chɨlop tep gup. Chɨbol nab chɨl ayaŋ mɨdtep gek gos pal ak teplep won ak nopul, God chɨlop kod mɨdaknɨŋ, yepɨs ma agɨl gɨ tɨmel ma gɨpul. Chɨl binɨb lum awl nab kɨli okok pel gɨtep gol nepal, pen nab nɨbi okok pelpel gɨtep yɨbɨl gol nɨgtep gɨpɨm. Chɨl pen lum awl gos ak dɨl gɨtep ma gɨpul. God chɨlop yɨmug nɨŋɨd gɨtep gɨl gos ñek, tap nɨŋɨd yɨbɨl yɨpɨd gɨl yɨbɨl gɨtep gɨpul.
